journals.notes: Sounds like a bug we've fixed in NQ after the 1.2.9 release. However I appreciate bug reports but this is probably not ETL related - I'll close this issue as invalid. If you run into same issue with the legacy mod just open it again.

subject: Input sometimes not working on result screen
description:
I just played 2.70rc1 (with NQ 1.2.9-b6) and had the problem that input was not working correctly in the chat/result screen at the end of a game.
Mouse movement was working, but I wasn't able to click any buttons (Quick Chat, Ready, More). The only key that seemed to be working was the ESC button, which correctly showed the menu, but I couldn't type anything into the chat input line.
Unfortunately I can't reproduce it. It works fine after most games, but this was now at least the second time I noticed this bug.
